r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Messa Computing. The average
  contract duration was 1.41 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $315.8K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.9M.
lookup_name: 'MESSA COMPUTING'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '46'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '25'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '54%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '186%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.44'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '5.5M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.41'
s421_mean_contract_value: '315.8K'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.9M'
